about.title: Justification and Context
about.paragraph1: Launched in response to the challenges and opportunities of Decentralization in Senegal, the first edition of the Senegal-Belgium-Luxembourg Territories Forum marked a decisive step in making visible the economic, cultural and environmental potential of African territories. It enabled the initiation of structuring dynamics of decentralized cooperation and investment between West Africa and Europe.
about.paragraph2: Faced with growing interest expressed by several African countries, the Forum has expanded its scope and becomes
about.paragraph2End: , a transnational platform dedicated to dialogue, sharing experiences and connecting public and private actors around concrete investment opportunities. This evolution reflects the ambition to consolidate a multilateral, inclusive space for exchange that is resolutely action-oriented.

site.heroTitle: Housing at the heart of Territories
site.heroSubtitle: Building together the cities and territories of tomorrow - Brussels, June 3-6, 2026

pillars.title: Why this Forum?
pillars.subtitle: Faced with the challenges of decentralization, territorial attractiveness and local development financing, the Territories Forum offers a pragmatic, structured and action-oriented response.
pillars.subtitleBold: Three fundamental pillars for effective and sustainable territorial cooperation

pillar1.title: Political and institutional dialogue
pillar1.description: Structured dialogue space between African territorial communities, European partners and public institutions

pillar2.title: Structuring and bankable territorial projects
pillar2.description: Highlighting territorial development projects validated by the competent authorities

resources.title: Territorial Resources
resources.paragraph1: Senegal remains a central pillar of the Forum, particularly through its six development hubs (Sine Saloum, Casamance, Eastern Senegal, Dakar/Thiès, Touba–Louga Triangle, Senegal River Delta). However, this second edition will open the floor to other African countries that will also present their sectoral potential, their territorial strategies and their bankable projects.
resources.paragraph2: Discover the opportunity sectors that drive growth and sustainable development

aPropos.pageSubtitle: Discover the Territories Forum and its commitment to sustainable development

presentation.title: Presentation
presentation.subtitle: A strategic platform for dialogue, investment and decentralized cooperation
presentation.paragraph1: The Territories Forum is a major initiative that brings together public decision-makers, private investors, economic actors and territorial communities around a common goal: creating sustainable synergies for territorial development.
presentation.paragraph2: This strategic platform emerges in a context marked by Act III of Decentralization in Senegal and the desire to strengthen decentralized cooperation between Africa and Europe.
presentation.paragraph3Highlight: Housing at the Heart of Territories
presentation.paragraph3End: , highlighting the crucial challenges of housing and urban planning in sustainable territorial development.

theme.title: Forum Theme
theme.subtitle: The central theme that structures all Forum activities
theme.themeQuote: "Housing as an ecosystem of life, economic activities and territorial investment"
theme.paragraph1: This theme places housing as the foundation of territorial development, directly linked to local governance, social justice, land access, financing, innovation and climate resilience.
theme.paragraph2: It structures all panels, workshops, presented projects and partnership opportunities of the Forum.
